A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie lacked. If you're expecting good character development and sub plots that actually go somewhere\, then this movie isn't for you. Does not libe up to the hype. Does not deliver a good farewell to on of the most beloved characters in movie history. Not even sure what the point of so much random useless characters thrown in is about (looking at you Phasma\, Snoke\, Rose).
